body.raw:
<ProjectsIntro />

<Callout>

This is a seletion of my last projects and works. You can find even more projects on my [github](https://github.com/podnesTaF)

</Callout>

## Projects

### Work and Personal projects

<CardContainer>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-web"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fevent-preview.png"
  title="The main platform for Ace Battle Association"
  tags="typescript,react,web,remixjs,nestjs"
/>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-mobile"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fmobile-preview.png"
  title="Ace Battle Events Mobile Platform"
  tags="typescript,react,mobile,reactnative,expo,nestjs"
/>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-web"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fahmo-chat.png"
  title="AHMO Chat Platforms"
  tags="typescript,react,web,remixjs,nestjs"
/>

</CardContainer>

### Projects in progress

These what I'm working with on my spare time:

<CardContainer>

<Card
  href="/projects/cfit-factory"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fcfit-factory.png"
  title="CFit Factory. CFit Factory - Cross-fit programs and execution. Mobile application"
  tags="typescript,react,web,remixjs,nextjs,reactnative,mobile"
/>

<Card
  href="/projects/feature-craft-js"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Ffcjs.png"
  title="Feature Craft Js - open source js advanced features library."
  tags="nextjs,library,features,nestjs"
/>

</CardContainer>

### Univerity Works

<CardContainer>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-web"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fevent-preview.png"
  title="The main platform for Ace Battle Association"
  tags="typescript,react,web,remixjs,nextjs"
/>

<Card
  href="/projects/abm-mobile"
  imageUrl="https://storage.googleapis.com/abe_cloud_storage/website%2Fmeminder.png"
  title="Meminder - web reminder app. Group work."
  tags="typescript,react,mobile,reactnative,expo,"
/>

</CardContainer>
